== Lyrics ==
The chorus is sung by the Chinese voice actors of [[Venti]] (Miaojiang), [[Zhongli]] (Peng Bo), [[Raiden Shogun]], (Juhuahua), [[Nahida]] (Hualing), [[Furina]] (Qian Chen), [[Mavuika]] (Li Ye), [[Paimon]] (Duoduo Poi), [[Kaeya]] (Sun Ye), [[Keqing]] (Xie Ying) and [[Xiao]] (kinsen).<ref>YouTube: [https://youtu.be/BDZZso6kJ0k?si=IRURbSXd4WCFrA9U 《原神》四周年主题曲《经过》【张杰】#四周年主题曲 #经过 #张杰 #原神 #Genshinlmpact #HoYoverse #Genshin4You] (Video Description)</ref>
